services.title: Cleaning Between Seasonal Rentals
services.description: This service is designed for owners of villas or apartments in seasonal rental. We intervene between each rental to prepare your property, ensuring that your guests find an immaculate space upon arrival. Each intervention is carried out meticulously to maintain your property in the best possible condition, guaranteeing positive reviews and maximum satisfaction from your guests.

services.title: Annual Cleaning for Resident Owners
services.description: We offer recurring cleaning services for owners who reside in their homes throughout the year. Our services are adapted to your schedule, ensuring the maintenance of impeccable cleanliness in your home, week after week.

services.title: Preparation Cleaning
services.description: This service is perfect for preparing a property before starting seasonal rentals. We perform a complete and thorough cleaning, ensuring that your property is ready to welcome the first guests.

services.title: Deep Cleaning
services.description: For intensive maintenance, this service is ideal for cleaning hard-to-reach areas, corners, fabrics, and surfaces that require special attention. This cleaning is recommended before the start of a new rental season.

services.title: Sofa and Carpet Cleaning
services.description: Removal of stains, allergens, and odors while preserving the quality of your fabrics and furniture.

services.title: Window Cleaning
services.description: Our teams ensure impeccable service, leaving your windows perfectly clean and streak-free for maximum brightness.

plansSubtitle: Our Flexible Plans for Every Need
plansItemOneDescription: Ideal for individuals looking for essential features
plansItemTwoDescription: Perfect for small teams and growing businesses
plansItemThreeDescription: Best for large enterprises with custom needs
customSolutionTitle: Tailored Solutions for Your Unique Needs
customSolutionDescription: We offer custom solutions that align perfectly with your business requirements. Our team works with you to create the ideal setup.
customSolutionCTA: Contact Us for a Custom Quote

rentalConditions.text: All fees are due on the 1st of each month

guideLinesLanguagesLocale: Warning: Do not alter the DO_NOT_CHANGE and currentLocale fields. They are linked to the website language. For example, changing 'en' to 'en_US' will lead to a non-existent page (e.g., https://excellence-conciergerie.com/en_US). Existing locales are pt, en, fr, es. Do not add non-existent locales. Only modify based on the current translation file. fr/common.js currentLocale should always be 'fr', en/common.js currentLocale should always be 'en', etc.
guideLinesLinks: Avertissement : Les seules valeurs acceptées pour les champs DO_NOT_CHANGE dans navLinks sont les IDs actuels du site web, qui sont les suivants : how-it-works, introduction, why-us, team, about, servies, faq, after-before, contact
heroSubtitle: Your Partner in Cleaning and Comfort
heroTitle: EXCELLENCE LAUNDRY – WASH OR RENT, THE CHOICE IS YOURS!
heroParagraphline1: At Excellence Laundry, we adapt to your needs. We offer professional washing to keep your textiles impeccable or the option to rent bed and bath linens, always fresh and ready to use.
heroParagraphline2: ✔ Premium laundry service – deep cleaning with high-quality products
heroParagraphline3: ✔ Linen rental – always impeccable, worry-free linens
heroParagraphline4: ✔ Punctuality and reliability – we deliver when and where you need it
heroParagraphline5: Choose the ideal solution for you and ensure comfort and quality effortlessly!

howItWorks.title: Request a Quote
howItWorks.description: Submit an online quote request to receive an accurate estimate of our cleaning services. We will respond promptly with a personalized offer.

howItWorks.title: Proposal Validation
howItWorks.description: Review and approve our cleaning proposal. Once we receive your approval, we will schedule the intervention at your convenience.

howItWorks.title: Professional Intervention
howItWorks.description: Our specialists will arrive at the specified address to perform the type of cleaning you specified, on the agreed date and time. You will enjoy a high-quality service, perfectly tailored to your needs.

introductionDescription: We take pride in offering a comprehensive range of laundry and maintenance services designed to exceed your expectations. Whether you are a luxury hotel manager or a seasonal rental operator, our experienced team ensures impeccable results with every request. Explore our key advantages.

introductionAdvantages.text: Annual cleaning service for resident owners;
Cleaning of sofas, carpets, and textiles;

whyUsDescription: At Excellence Cleaners, with over 3 years of expertise in cleaning luxury villas and apartments for seasonal rentals, we stand out for our commitment to delivering impeccable service. We understand the importance of first impressions for your tenants and ensure that your property is always perfect between stays.

whyUsReasons.title: Annual cleaning service for resident owners
whyUsReasons.description: In addition to seasonal rentals, we offer regular maintenance contracts for resident owners. Our annual cleaning service ensures a clean and welcoming home throughout the year, allowing you to worry less.

whyUsReasons.title: Flexibility and rapid intervention
whyUsReasons.description: Our teams are flexible and adapt to your needs. We mobilize multiple agents for quick interventions, especially between two seasonal rentals, to maximize your rental periods.

whyUsReasons.title: Quality and attention to detail
whyUsReasons.description: We understand the demands of prestigious properties. Our team, trained to satisfy both owners and tenants, cleans every corner with precision, ensuring that your property is always immaculate.

whyUsReasons.title: Transparent pricing
whyUsReasons.description: Our prices start from €26.90HT/hour. The duration of interventions is adjusted based on the number of agents, with complete transparency about costs. This way, you enjoy high-quality service without unpleasant surprises.

whyUsReasons.title: Advantages of choosing Excellence Cleaners and our team
whyUsReasons.description: Choosing Excellence Cleaners means opting for a dedicated, professional team trained in the most advanced cleaning techniques. We use modern, high-quality equipment, ensuring superior results and optimizing the effectiveness of our processes. We are committed to delivering timely, high-quality service in every intervention. Our employees are rigorously selected for their expertise and reliability, ensuring safety and discretion in your property. Additionally, we pay special attention to your specific needs and requirements to provide a personalized service that exceeds your expectations. With Excellence Cleaners, you can be confident that you are working with a competent, engaged, and attentive team.

messageDescription: Welcome to Excellence Cleaners. As the General Director, it is my great pleasure to welcome you. For property owners, we take care of your assets with passion and discretion. For travelers, we promise an exceptional and confidential experience. Excellence Cleaners embodies refinement, discretion, and personalized attention. Welcome to excellence.
teamSubtitle: Our Commitment to Our Team and Community
teamTitle: A Team Dedicated to Your Satisfaction
teamDescription: At Excellence Cleaners, we firmly believe that the quality of our services depends on the investment we make in our team and the community around us. Therefore, we are committed to providing a respectful work environment and positively contributing to local development. We know that our employees and our community are at the heart of our success, and it is with this spirit that we implement concrete actions to make a difference.
teamMinorDescriptionFirst: We are committed to providing our employees with a healthy, respectful, and motivating work environment. This includes regular training to enhance their skills, fair working conditions, and opportunities for professional growth. We believe that a fulfilled team is key to delivering excellence in service to our clients.
teamMinorTitleSecond: Commitment to Responsible and Sustainable Cleaning
teamMinorDescriptionSecond: We take environmental protection seriously by using eco-friendly products and adopting cleaning practices that respect the planet. Our responsible approach ensures not only a healthy environment for our clients and team but also a reduction in our ecological footprint.
aboutDescriptionline1: At Excellence Laundry, we offer complete laundry solutions for professionals in various sectors, including hotels, guesthouses, vacation rentals, and more. Our commitment is to ensure that your linens are always impeccable, clean, and fresh, providing an exceptional experience for your customers.
aboutDescriptionline2: With an experienced and dedicated team, we use cutting-edge technology and washing methods that preserve fabric quality. In addition, we offer linen rental services, ensuring practicality and cost savings for your business. Our portfolio includes bed linens, towels, duvets, pillowcases, and specialized items, all maintained in perfect condition and ready for immediate use.
aboutDescriptionline3: Excellence Laundry is the right choice for those seeking a reliable and professional service, with attention to detail and personalized customer care. We are here to take care of what is essential for your establishment so that you can focus on what truly matters: providing the best experience for your customers.
aboutDescriptionline4: Our mission is to simplify laundry management for our partners and ensure maximum satisfaction with our services. Count on us to make your linen management more efficient and hassle-free.
faqDescriptionOne: Do you have questions about our services? We have compiled answers to the most common questions to help you better understand how we work and what we offer.
faqDescriptionTwo: If you can’t find the answer you’re looking for, feel free to contact us directly. We are here to help!

faq.title: How can I book a cleaning service?
faq.description: Simply contact us via phone, WhatsApp, or email. We will discuss your specific needs and schedule a date and time for the intervention. We are flexible and adapt to your availability to provide you with personalized service.

faq.title: What types of properties do you clean?
faq.description: We specialize in cleaning prestigious homes and apartments, particularly those intended for seasonal rental. However, we also clean primary residences. Whether you are a resident owner or managing a rental property, we have the right solution for your needs.

faq.title: How do you determine the number of people for the service?
faq.description: The number of assigned personnel depends on the size of the property and the type of service requested. We assess each situation individually to ensure efficient and quick cleaning. When sending more than one person, the execution time is reduced while maintaining the quality of service.

faq.title: What products and equipment do you use?
faq.description: We use high-quality professional cleaning products that are environmentally friendly and safe for delicate surfaces. Our team is equipped with all the necessary materials to perform a complete cleaning, including specialized equipment for sofas, carpets, and glass. If you have preferences for specific products, we can adapt accordingly.

faq.title: Do you offer regular cleaning contracts?
faq.description: Yes, we offer regular services for clients who want long-term maintenance, whether for primary residences or seasonal rental properties. We can arrange weekly, monthly, or as-needed interventions, always with the same rigor and quality.

faq.title: What are your prices and how are they calculated?
faq.description: Our prices start from €26.90/hour (excluding VAT) per person. The total cost depends on the number of hours required and the number of people mobilized for the service. When more than one person intervenes, the cleaning time is reduced proportionally. We always provide an estimate before each service, ensuring complete transparency.

contactDescription: At Excellence Laundry, we are always available to answer your questions and provide the best solution for your establishment's needs. If you would like more information about our services, personalized quotes, or have any doubts, please contact us through the following means:
thankYouForYourSubmission: Thank you for your submission. We will contact you soon.

array.description: Welcome to our website. By continuing to browse and use this site, you agree to comply with and be governed by the following terms of use, which regulate our relationship with you in relation to this site, as well as our privacy policy.

array.title: 4. Limitation of Liability

array.title: 1. Information We Collect
array.description: We may collect the following information: name, contact details, including email address, demographic information such as postal code, preferences and interests, and other information relevant to surveys and/or customer offers.

array.title: 2. Use of the Information We Collect
array.description: We need this information to understand your needs and provide a better service, especially for the following purposes: maintaining internal records, improving our products and services, sending promotional emails about new products, special offers, or other information that we believe you may find interesting using the email address provided.

array.title: 3. Security
array.description: We are committed to ensuring the security of your information. To prevent unauthorized access or disclosure, we have implemented appropriate physical, electronic, and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure the information we collect online.

array.title: 4. Use of Cookies
array.description: A cookie is a small file that requests permission to be placed on your computer's hard drive. Once accepted, the file is added, and the cookie helps analyze web traffic or informs when you visit a specific site. Cookies allow web applications to respond to you as an individual. The web application can tailor its operations to your needs, likes, and dislikes, by collecting and remembering information about your preferences.

privacyPolicyWarningText: By submitting this form, you agree to our

footerDescription: Excellence Cleaners is a company specialized in cleaning services for different types of properties on the Côte d'Azur. We offer a complete range of cleaning services tailored to the specific needs of each property and service. Our team of specialists ensures personalized cleaning, with impeccable quality and total satisfaction.
thankYouDescription: We appreciate you getting in touch. Our team will review your message and respond as soon as possible.
additionalInfo: In the meantime, feel free to explore our website further.
description: Whether it's a hotel, a guesthouse, or a concierge service, Excellence Laundry is here to simplify the management of your linen and ensure it is always clean and impeccable for your customers. Say goodbye to concerns about logistics and the maintenance of your textiles and hygiene equipment. Let us take care of these tasks so you can focus on what truly matters: providing an unforgettable experience for your customers.
packageDescription: At Excellence Laundry, we offer customized packages to meet the specific needs of hotels, guesthouses, and concierge services. Our packages are designed to ensure quality and efficiency in handling your linen and hygiene equipment, always with the goal of providing the best experience for your customers. Contact us to learn about the available packages and choose the one that best suits your business. We are here to simplify the management of your establishment, allowing you to focus on what truly matters.
largebedkitDescription: Washing, drying, and ironing for 1 double bed (140, 160, or 180 cm): 1 sheet, 1 duvet cover, 2 pillowcases
smallbedkitDescription: Washing, drying, and ironing for 1 single bed (80 or 90 cm): 1 sheet, 1 duvet cover, 1 pillowcase
duokitDescription: Washing, drying, ironing, and folding: 1 fitted sheet, 1 duvet cover, 2 pillowcases, 2 bath towels, 2 hand towels, 1 bath mat, 2 dish towels
descriptionLaundry: At Excellence Laundry, we offer a professional linen rental and maintenance service, providing a practical and economical solution for managing your linen inventory. With our service, you can rent pillows, sheets, duvets, duvet covers, towels, and more, while we take care of everything for you. We ensure that your linen is always clean and fresh throughout the year, thanks to our professional maintenance service. Our rental and maintenance service is designed to help you focus on your guests' experience while leaving the management of your linens to our experts. We offer affordable rental solutions for hotels, vacation rentals, and other professionals, tailored to your specific needs.
packageDescriptionDuo: Complete rental: 1 fitted sheet, 1 duvet cover, 2 pillowcases, 2 bath towels, 2 hand towels, 1 bath mat, 1 kitchen towel
packageDescriptionLargeBed: Rental for 1 double bed (140, 160, or 180 cm): 1 sheet, 1 duvet cover, 2 pillowcases
packageDescriptionSmallBed: Rental for 1 single bed (80 or 90 cm): 1 sheet, 1 duvet cover, 1 pillowcase
itemDescriptionSheetLarge: 1 fitted or flat sheet (140, 160, or 180 cm)
babyItemDescriptionCrib: Rental of portable crib with mattress and protective cover
consumableDescriptionPaperTowel: Disposable paper towel roll (price per roll)
rentalCondition1: All rentals are for a maximum period of 7 nights. A surcharge of €2 per kit, per night, will be applied from the 8th night onwards.
rentalCondition2: A security deposit will be required on the first rental.
rentalCondition3: In case of excessive use (blood stains, makeup, shoe marks, ink, etc.), an additional fee will be charged.
rentalCondition4: In case of damage, the replacement cost of the new item will be charged.
finalNotes: These prices and conditions ensure that Excellence Laundry's services meet the needs of our professional customers with practicality and quality.
